Class MultiplePlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards.MultiplePlayer

CustomMode
public class MultiplePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomMode
public class used to implement the endTurnAction method in case of a multiplayer match
